All Implemented Interfaces:
IEfficiencyCalibrator, IRegressionEfficiencyCalibrator
public class LSRLEfficiencyCalibrator
extends BaseLSRLEfficiencyCalibrator

Uses a Least-Squares Regression Line to solve for efficiency. (A simple linear regression model)

Constructor Summary

          Generates a LSRL through the given points of data.

          Generates a LSRL from given slope and intercept data.
LSRLEfficiencyCalibrator(double slope, double intercept, double rValue)
          Generates a LSRL from given slope, intercept, and r-value.
